problem_text_cn: 如图,A,B,C,D四点在⊙O上,四边形ABCD的一条外角∠DCE=70°,则∠BOD等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the four points A, B, C, and D are on ⊙O, and an exterior angle of the quadrilateral ABCD ∠DCE = N_0, then ∠BOD is equal to ()
raw_answer:
解:(圆的内接四边形外角等于内对角)∵四边形ABCD的一条外角∠DCE=70°,∴∠A=∠DCE=70°,∴∠BOD=2∠A=140°．
故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题利用了圆内接四边形的性质和圆周角定理求解．
